A C&D is a Cease and Desist e-mail your ISP provider sends you when they receive a complaint from a threatening source such as the MPAA. Warning you to stop downloading illegal content. Always have PG2 running when you are downloading. It blocks known, fake IP's from connecting to your computer. Only setback is... they cant find 'em all. But keep it updated and you should be cool.
